title: PLAT 1 = WORST  ELO
body:
TROLLS, TOXIC, REFUSE COMMUNICATE, BOOSTED DIAMONDS 

GFG

replies.body: lmfao get gud nub. boosted diamond players trolling the %%%% outta u cause u 2 slow for the rewards ^^ get diamond faster like the rest of us
Lmfao yet you are plat 2? I smell a trash booster that don't deserve diamond
I'm sorry, have you tried Bronze V?

damn that must be annoying :(
at least you can make plays which would be risky in low elo but aren't in plat 1 because your team knows how to follow up.
hahahahahahahahaha u mad brah got the diamond boarder gg. u mad? gum on mang get gud p1 nub
